title: Legal - Documents and Policies | Vbrick
content:
Legal – Documents and PoliciesCurtis Harry2024-10-31T17:06:46-04:00

Web Site Privacy Policy

Click here to see how we use, collect, process, and share the information, including information about our business partners and visitors to our website, information from external sources, or information we obtain from individuals interact with Vbrick employees offline.

Web Site Cookie Policy

Click here to see how the pages of www.vbrick.com use cookies.

Vbrick Customer Support Plan Document

Click here to see how we provide services and updates to our supported customers.

Vbrick Cloud Services Uptime SLA

Click here to see Vbrick’s uptime service level commitment for its cloud subscription customers.

Subscription End User License Agreement (“EULA”)

Click here to see our end user license terms for software subscription users.

Vbrick Customer Acceptable Use Policy

Click here to see what behavior is prohibited in any customer use of Vbrick’s systems, network, and related services.

Vbrick Customer Data Protection Addendum

Click here to see how Vbrick complies with various data protection laws and how such protections are incorporated into your agreements with Vbrick.

Vbrick GDPR Policy

Click here to see how Vbrick complies with the GDPR regulations and protects the data of its European customers, following the privacy principles of transparency, fairness, and accountability.

Vbrick Data Subprocessors

Click here to see a list of parties Vbrick uses in the processing of customer data.

Vbrick EU and Swiss US Shield Policies

Click here to see how Vbrick complies with EU-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework and Swiss-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce.

Vbrick Anti-Slavery Policy

Click here to see how Vbrick advocates for and complies with anti-slavery policies and regulations.

Vbrick Environmental Commitment

Click here to see how Vbrick endeavors to perform as a company in a conscientious manner regarding its impact on the environment.
